1.content:
You sigh in content, you just arrived at your Aunt's place one hour ago. It was an all day trip to get to this place, but it was worth it. You were gonna need a place to stay to attend college and your Aunt wanted the house looked after while she went on a year long trip, it was perfect. You saw the place was well looked after already, a faint scent of lavender permeated the house.

It was a two floor deal, but overall was a small place. Your bedroom was second floor, you went up and put your luggage bag down on the floor. It contained your clothes, a PS4, your books and bathroom stuff. It was a plain looking room, but it at least had a double bed and a big TV. The living room downstairs had a nice fireplace and small TV and looked well cared for. Your Aunt was pretty tidy all round. The bathroom was a bath and shower set, you noticed a note on the door of it.

"Dear (y/n)

Thanks for agreeing to stay at my place while I go on holiday, I wish you best of luck in your studies. Don't worry about the area, crime hardly ever happens here and the people keep to themselves. I once heard some rumours that your next door neighbour is a bit odd, I've never really met them though so take it with a pinch of salt. Good luck now. Love your aunty."

Setting the note down you walked over to the fridge, it was looking a bit bare. The day was getting late but the stores should still be open, there was a large amount of cash that you were told about in your bedroom to be spent to keep yourself okay. Getting some you head out the door.

Little did you know someone next door was looking out the window at you.

"There's a guy living there, he looks pretty handsome." a female voice mutters......

Who is your neighbour?
1.title: Moved in

choices: A near doll like woman with long black hair
An ebony skinned amazon of a woman
11.content:
The woman woke an hour ago, she was the kind to sleep during the day. Because she couldn't survive under the sun, it was the bask of the moon that she favoured. Beloved by the night she was wanting to find someone nearby that would be a delight to have. She was a vampire, an immortal being. One that feasted on blood in order to survive. She'd just seen you emerging from the house, licking her lips in anticipation. Perhaps she could have a new companion or a plaything, she always did love the bodies of young men.....

But what did she look like?........
11.title: A vampire

choices: Sinks her teeth into your neck
Suddenly falls to the floor and breaks her spell over you.
111.content:
The woman resembled a doll, with pale white skin that was near porcelain and cold to the touch. Her lips were ruby red, tinted the same colour of the liquid she used to feed. Not a hair was out of place on her mane of raven black hair. Dressed in a small black dress and nothing else. Her name was Annabelle. She'd learned of you and desired to "Make friends with the neighbour." Sighing with a deep tone she cast her mind outwards.

Meanwhile you just got out the bathroom dressed in your PJs and getting ready to settle down for the night, after all you were already drained by the trip up here. Suddenly everything went black and deaf, then your senses returned. But there was now.....a voice in your mind.........

"Y/N. I command you to make your way to my house next to yours, I've unlocked the door......" a voice chimed into your mind. Its tone was ghost like, smooth as silk. Your facial features included glazed over eyes and a fish like mouth. Wordlessly you strode out the door clad only in your pyjamas, thankfully it was dark out now and most people were in bed. There was a light chill in the air, but it didn't register on you.

Without even waiting for permission you open the door and walk in, the hallway is pitch black. But you hear a smooth velvet voice from the end of the hall. "Enter Y/N, I have tasks I must give you....." Annabelle mutters.

You walk in, the room smells of rose incense. Grinning Annabelle licks her lips once again, gracefully standing to her full height. She was actually half a foot taller than you, but in your stupor you didn't know this.

https://thefischerhouse.net/wp-content/u...

"Sit." Annabelle states as she points at the stool to her left, you sit straight on top of it. Annabelle then traces her manicured nails across your chin. Then.....
111.title: A near doll like woman with long black hair

choices: You and Annabelle make love till dawn

1112.content:
Annabelle was going to relish this, rarely had she fed off a cute young thing such as yourself. Annabelle had....certain tastes, not just that but she......needed it. In fact Annabelle had gone for so long without blood that she......

Suddenly collapsed! Annabelle's legs suddenly gave out, her lack of blood intake had left her brittle. Now she was finally giving out, she landed on the floor in a heap and started to convulse and twitch. Her mind control over you had broken, bringing you back to your senses. You shook your head rapidly, realising where you were at. You realised you were still in your pyjamas, like a thunder bolt you made a rush for the door. Yanking it open and rushing into the hallway you were cut off by a voice from the room.

"N-no......P-Please don't go! I-I'm too weak......Please....." Annabelle said as she crawled after you, in that way she just looked......vulnerable......her pale skin looking even more so now. You wanted to just run out the door, not to look back. But your heart was being tugged at. Biting your lower lip you sigh, running up to her and hefting her petite frame up to that bed of hers.

"Okay.....J-just don't kill me okay?" you mutter, feeling just as scared as Annabelle was. Annabelle quickly nods, you lean your neck out. Expecting her to bite there, only for the vampire to quickly grab your nearest arm and sink her teeth into your veins. You yelp out in shock and on instinct try to move, only for Annabelle to cling to it with her fangs and hands. Wordlessly Annabelle proceeds to drink from you, it actually feels.....pleasurable. In an odd sort of way that you couldn't accurately describe. But it sent waves of pleasure up the base of your spine, making you shiver in delight.

Annabelle seemed to visibly change before your eyes, her skin seemed to flush and become more warmer looking. Her lips seeming more lively, also you swore you could actually see her breasts grow. At least by a cup. After a couple of minutes of this Annabelle sealed your wound with her tongue and lay backwards on the bed. Annabelle pants quietly, your feeling a bit weak after that. You didn't know how much blood you lost, but your a bit light headed.

"Thank you so much Y/N....." Annabelle mutters.

"N-No problem......I'm a bit tired....." you say in response as you gaze up the ceiling.

It was then Annabelle suddenly mounted you, tugging off her dress. Revealing those magnificent curves empowered by your blood. "Your not going to sleep till I tell you. I need to reward you after all......." Annabelle mutters. Suddenly everything was looking farrrrrrr better........

152.content:
You were being watched from the second floor window next door, you would have only been able to see a slim shadow at the window frame. She quietly purred under her throat, this woman had just moved into the place. Actually a couple of weeks before you arrived with her Mother. The girl had been pestered by her Mother to try and find herself a potential mate after they got the place.

But none of the people around here caught her eye, until you. Being a strapping young lad that was good looking, cute even to her. She bore feline features, drumming her manicured claw like nails on the nearby wall. She licked her lips and planned to introduce herself to you later tonight.........

Night had fallen, the last rays of sunlight was covered by the nearby homes. You were kicking back in your bedroom, playing some Fortnite to pass the hours until you were ready for bed. Taking a sip out of your litre of spring water you kept going, making it to top 10. Chuffed with yourself you reckon its time to wind down, you hit the shower.

1553.title: Something else

info.brief_description: You've moved into a new house, the next door neighbour isn't normal though.....
info.description:
You are (y/n), a young man who just turned 21. You've entered college and moved to your aunt's house, she's going on holiday for a year and left you in charge. Its a win-win in your mind. You go to college and have a place to crash, its a quiet place with not a lot of crime happening.

She didn't tell you about your neighbours though.......

So for rules......

1. No death unless its not permanent
2. All people involved are 16 years old at least.
3. The neighbour is female but can have male relatives, we are going to keep this hetro.

500 Gift Points will be awarded for good adds, have fun and enjoy. There was a similar story to this when I first started here on Writing.com, hopefully we can make lots of chapters on this. :)
